title: FDA Expands Use of Advanced AI for Safety Reviews and Inspections
description: December 4, 2025 – The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced on Monday that it has deployed a version of artificial intelligence called “agentic AI” for “all agency employees” to assist with complex tasks, including safety reviews, inspections, and com…
content:
In response to questions about how the FDA specifically plans to use agentic AI in its Human Foods Program, a spokesperson emphasized the role employees will continue to play.
